title: Podcast #040 – Serial 1 president explains Harley-Davidson’s e-bike plan
content:
When none other than Harley Davidson launches an e-bike brand, we have to wonder how they’re going to complete? What’s makes Serial 1 unique, and how will they translate the Hog culture into pedal-assist bicycles? Yes, they raised a few eyebrows when they announced they were launching an electric bike brand, but one look at […]

The post Podcast #040 – Serial 1 president explains Harley-Davidson’s e-bike plan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
